segments.text: Good morning , sir . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I'd like to pay my bill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . In cash or by credit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In cash . How much is the total charge ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Five hundred and thirty yuan altogether including charges for service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are . Thanks for your wonderful service .
segments.speaker: S2
